# Resources

This page describes how the site and its associated data were built.

## Framework {-}

The site was built in R Markdown/Quarto and rendered to HTML using [Quarto](https://quarto.org).

Source code is located in `src/`. The GitHub site is at <https://github.com/databrary/nsf-oac-2032713>.
The rendered HTML website is in `docs/`.
We use GitHub's pages feature to serve the site.

## Dependencies {-}

The site makes use of several external resources.

- Databrary analytics site: <https://databrary.github.io/analytics>.
- `databraryr` package: <https://databrary.github.io/databraryr>
- <https://github.com/databrary/metadata>.
